dmca.title: Mitek, via Net Enforcers, complains of image copyright infringement
dmca.body:
Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property
rights, said owner being named [Mitek Corp] ("IP Owner"). I have a good
faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized
by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP
Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act
expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed
to be infringing.
Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [Mitek Corp]/:
Avperfection

http://froogle.google com/froogle_image?q=http://www.avperf ection.com/ProdIm
ages/hp693.4-small.jpg&size=2&dhm=3ae4a451&hl=en
 
Ubid

http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://static.ubi d.com/mgen/pimg/s
cale.ms%3Fargs%3D%2522197388.jpg%2522,400,400&size=2&dhm=72 74d838&hl=en
Soundcity

http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.soundc ity.com/prod imag
es/12397.jpg&size=2&dhm=8e2lbbdc&hl=en
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification
is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the
copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive
right that is allegedly infringed.
Printed Name: [ [private] ]

Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.] Street Address: [[private]] City and State: [Coral Springs, FL] Zip: [33075 ]

Email [[private]@netenforcers.com] Fax: [[private]]

Date: [11-30-05]
 
Truthfully,
/S/: [private] (Original Signature on File)
